document_data.name: Summon Monster IV
document_data.mainbody: '''''Summon monster IV''''', was one of the series of ''[[summon monster]]'' spells available to spellcasters.
document_data.Effects:
This spell functioned similar to the other ''summon monster'' spells. It spell could conjure [[dire spider]]s,

Prior to the {{yearlinkName|1372}}, could summon between one and three monsters within a {{SIAdj|60|ft|long=yes}} radius of the caster.{{cite book/Monstrous Manual|377}} If cast into salt water, its summons could be answered by [[hippocampi]], [[kapoacinth]]s, giant [[crayfish]], [[merrow]]s, giant [[otter]]s, [[shark]]s, [[triton]]s, or yellow [[urchin]]s. In fresh water, it could bring instead [[giant water beetle]]s, giant [[crayfish]], [[kapoacinth]]s, [[kelpie]]s, [[merrow]]s, [[giant otter]]s, [[giant pike]]s, or [[giant water spider]]s.{{cite book/Monstrous Manual|378}}
document_data.Components: This spell had the [[material component]] of a small bag and [[candle]].
